description:
The investment seeks daily investment results before fees and expenses that correspond to two times the inverse (-2x) of the daily performance of the S&P SmallCap 600® Index.
 The fund invests in financial instruments that ProShare Advisors believes, in combination, should produce daily returns consistent with the fund's investment objective. The index is a measure of small-cap company U.S. stock market performance. The fund is non-diversified.
